creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: man kneeling on PR knee hoisting a baby over his PL knee with his PL hand; both figures are smiling; man is holding an object against baby's leg
marks: Signature base, on red lacquer inlay: [ 静一 ] (Seiichi)
title: (Man and boy)
